title: Simplify admin panel authentication to username and password only

requirements.text: Remove any verification or multi-step authentication process from the admin login flow. The admin panel should authenticate using only username and password credentials.

quotes: no veryfy only usr and pass dalo opne ho jana chahiye

acceptanceCriteria: Admin login form displays only username and password fields
No verification step or additional authentication screens appear after entering credentials
Admin panel opens immediately upon successful username/password validation

requirements.text: Ensure that admin access is granted only when both the username and password match the actual stored credentials (username: 6352174912, password: 63521). Invalid credentials should be rejected.

quotes: bur real user name and real pass ho tab hi

acceptanceCriteria: Login succeeds only when username exactly matches 6352174912 and password exactly matches 63521
Any mismatch in username or password displays an error message
Partial matches or incorrect credentials do not grant access

requirements.text: Streamline the authentication process to be direct and simple with no additional processing steps or complexity beyond credential validation.
acceptanceCriteria: Authentication flow completes in a single step after submitting credentials
No loading states, intermediate screens, or unnecessary processing delays
User sees immediate feedback (success or error) after credential submission

constraints: Maintain the existing hardcoded credentials (username: 6352174912, password: 63521)
Preserve session storage-based authentication state management
Do not modify backend authentication logic
nonGoals: Implementing Internet Identity integration for admin access
Adding password reset or recovery functionality
Changing the admin credentials to different values
